title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.1 - General

State Regulations

The department shall use the procedures in this Part in
providing public access to information under the Freedom of Information Law
(Public Officers Law, sections 84-90). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
340.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
